search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Wisepops (wisepops.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Wisepops can be found at: [https://wisepops.com/pricing](https://wisepops.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

![Image 2](https://a.storyblok.com/f/156985/240x240/0344faa027/jeronime-schneider-pink.png/m/)

“The multitude of customization options makes it super easy for me to send personalized messages of different kinds (product launch, commercial offers, editorial content, etc.), with a design that fully integrate with my website”

Jeromine Schneider

e-Commerce manager, Nuoo

Feature list
------------

|  | Essential | Intelligence |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Popups, Bars, Embeds |   |   |
| Onsite Notifications |   |   |
| Web Push |   |   |
| AI Product Recommendations (Shopify only) |   |   |
| Experimentation Platform |   |   |
| Customized feed |   |   |
| Websites | up to 10 websites ($10 per additional website) | 10 websites ($10 per additional website) |
| Price for extra website | +$10/monthy | Custom |
| Users | Unlimited | Unlimited |
| Priority support | Standard | VIP |
| Public integrations |   |   |
| Shopify integration |   |   |
| Custom integrations |   |   |
| Popup templates |   |   |
| Tailored popup templates |   |   |
| Campaigns migration |   |   |
| AB Testing |   |   |
| Control Group in A/B Test |   |   |
| CSS Customization |   |   |
| Custom Properties |   |   |
| Shopify Properties |   |   |
| JS Callbacks |   |   |
| Revenue attribution |   |   |
| Goal Tracking |   |   |
| Advanced Analytics |   |   |
| Account Manager |   |   |
| 1:1 Onboarding |   |   |
| Tailored strategy planning |   |   |
| Quarterly business reviews |   |   |

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   Can I use Wisepops for free?
    
    Our free trial includes full access to all features of the Essential plan (popups, onsite notifications, web push, embeds, analytics, A/B testing, and more). You can also request our team to start a trial for the Intelligence plan, giving you access to AI recommendations and the Experiments platform. The 14-day trial for the Intelligence plan can be started independently of the Essential plan trial.
    
*   How do you calculate page views?
    
    A pageview occurs when a user visits a page on your website. That’s exactly how we count: one pageview is counted each time a page of your website is loaded by a visitor.
    
*   What happens if I reach my plan’s limits?
    
    No worries. We’ll notify you when you reach 90% of your plan’s pageviews. Once the limit is hit, the campaigns will be paused, so you won’t get any unexpected charges. From there, you can upgrade or reactivate at any time.
    
*   What if I want to change plans?
    
    No problem. Just log in to Wisepops and click on your account picture. Choose **Change plan** in the menu that appears.
    
*   I want to have a custom integration with my CRM. Can you do it for me?
    
    Yes, custom CRM integration is a part of our Enterprise plan. Users of other plans can connect Wisepops with their tech stack through Zapier or our [native integrations](https://wisepops.com/integrations/). If you need details on custom integrations, [get in touch with us](https://wisepops.com/contact-us)[.](https://wisepops.com/contact-us)
    
*   How can I pay for Wisepops?
    
    We accept major credit cards through a secure payment processor: Stripe. You can pay monthly or choose an annual subscription with a proper discount (2 months are for free). Of course, there’s a 14-day unlimited free trial to help you choose.
    
*   Do I need technical knowledge to install and use Wisepops?
    
    All you need to do is add a setup code to your website, so no major technical skills are needed. Using Wisepops does not require any knowledge, so you can easily build and run your campaigns. Should you need any help, visit our [Knowledge Base](https://support.wisepops.com/) or get in touch with our team.
    
*   I'm just getting started. Do you offer any helpful training, coaching, or extra support?
    
    Absolutely! As a new user of Wisepops, you're never alone in your journey to create engaging onsite marketing campaigns. Here's what we offer to help you get started and succeed:
    
    *   **Wisepops Community Access**: Upon signing up for Wisepops, you'll be welcomed into our private community. It's a space where you can engage with a diverse network of Wisepops users, exchange ideas, and learn from shared experiences.
        
    
    *   **Helpcenter and Tutorials**: We provide a range of tutorials in our Helpcenter that are designed to equip you with practical skills and knowledge for designing effective pop-ups. Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your skills, our tutorials cater to all levels.
        
    
    *   **Weekly Coaching Sessions**: Our weekly coaching sessions are led by seasoned Wisepops professionals. These sessions are an opportunity for you to receive guidance, ask questions, and gain insights specific to your needs.
        
    
    Once you sign up for Wisepops, you'll receive an email within minutes detailing how to access all these resources. We're committed to providing the support and tools you need to create impactful and high-converting marketing campaigns.
    
*   How do I choose the right plan for my business?
    
    We base our pricing on the number of pageviews as well as customer support access.
    
    Example: the 50K and 100K pageviews plans include support via AI support bot, Help Center, and the Wisepops community forum while the 250K and 500K plans add chat support. The 1M pageviews plan also includes a personalized onboarding session. The Enterprise plan adds technical support and strategy calls.
    
    But regardless of the plan you choose, you get all our features along with unlimited campaigns and users.
    
*   How do support access plans differ?
    
    Our support access plans are tailored to cater to a variety of needs, whether you're just starting out or operating at a large scale. Here's a brief overview:
    
    1.  **Basic Plan:**
        
        *   Suitable for **50k to 100k pageviews**.
            
        *   Support is accessible via **email, AI chatbot, Community,** and **Help Docs**.
            
        *   Service requests are addressed within **3 business days**.
            
    2.  **Plus Plan:**
        
        *   Designed for **250k to 500k pageviews**.
            
        *   Adds **live chat support** to the channels available in the Basic plan.
            
        *   Service requests are addressed within **2 business days**.
            
    3.  **Extended Plan:**
        
        *   Tailored for websites with up to **1M pageviews**.
            
        *   Support channels are the same as the Plus plan.
            
        *   Enhanced service response with requests being addressed within **1 business day**.
            
    4.  **Enterprise Plan:**
        
        *   For those operating beyond **1M pageviews**.
            
        *   Introduces **Priority Chat and tech support** in addition to other channels.
            
        *   Rapid response with requests attended to within **12 business hours**.
            
        *   Exclusive benefits like **1:1 onboarding sessions, dedicated success manager, quarterly business review sessions,** and **campaign migrations** are available for those on annual plans.
            
    
*   Do you offer agency plans?
    
    We do! Just [**drop us an email**](https://wisepops.com/contact-us) and we will help you get this set up.
    
*   Do you have any discounts for nonprofits?
    
    Of course! Yes, 30% off. [Contact us](https://wisepops.com/contact-us) to claim the offer.
    

### You’re in good company.  
Get started with Wisepops today.

Loyal customers power your  
long-term growth
---------------------------------------------

Wisepops supercharges growth for brands and marketers like you.

*   In 3 days, Wisepops helped us generate 42% of our monthly revenue.
    
    ![Image 3: Elodie Trebuchet](https://a.storyblok.com/f/156985/256x256/dc351c487a/elodietrebuchet.png)
    
    Elodie Trebuchete-Commerce Director, Soi Paris
    
*   80% of my email list comes from Wisepops popups and bars campaigns.
    
    ![Image 4: Emilien Foiret - avatar](https://a.storyblok.com/f/156985/256x256/f7a1282a1b/emilien_foiret.png)
    
    Emilien FoiretCo-founder & CMO, Cabaia
    
*   Our first abandoned cart popup campaign generated $50k in 2 months.
    
    ![Image 5: Jules Deleo - avatar](https://a.storyblok.com/f/156985/256x256/4b96690ed2/jules_deleo.png)
    
    Jules DeLeoGrowth Marketer, Baudville
    

Stop wasting your traffic  
Get started with Wisepops today
-----------------------------------------------------------

[Help](https://support.wisepops.com/#confirm-consent)

Wisepops plans and pricing. Start a 14-day free trial of our onsite marketing platform today.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   Can I use Wisepops for free?
    
    Our free trial includes full access to all features of the Essential plan (popups, onsite notifications, web push, embeds, analytics, A/B testing, and more). You can also request our team to start a trial for the Intelligence plan, giving you access to AI recommendations and the Experiments platform. The 14-day trial for the Intelligence plan can be started independently of the Essential plan trial.
    
*   How do you calculate page views?
    
    A pageview occurs when a user visits a page on your website. That’s exactly how we count: one pageview is counted each time a page of your website is loaded by a visitor.
    
*   What happens if I reach my plan’s limits?
    
    No worries. We’ll notify you when you reach 90% of your plan’s pageviews. Once the limit is hit, the campaigns will be paused, so you won’t get any unexpected charges. From there, you can upgrade or reactivate at any time.
    
*   What if I want to change plans?
    
    No problem. Just log in to Wisepops and click on your account picture. Choose **Change plan** in the menu that appears.
    
*   I want to have a custom integration with my CRM. Can you do it for me?
    
    Yes, custom CRM integration is a part of our Enterprise plan. Users of other plans can connect Wisepops with their tech stack through Zapier or our [native integrations](https://wisepops.com/integrations/). If you need details on custom integrations, [get in touch with us](https://wisepops.com/contact-us)[.](https://wisepops.com/contact-us)
    
*   How can I pay for Wisepops?
    
    We accept major credit cards through a secure payment processor: Stripe. You can pay monthly or choose an annual subscription with a proper discount (2 months are for free). Of course, there’s a 14-day unlimited free trial to help you choose.
    
*   Do I need technical knowledge to install and use Wisepops?
    
    All you need to do is add a setup code to your website, so no major technical skills are needed. Using Wisepops does not require any knowledge, so you can easily build and run your campaigns. Should you need any help, visit our [Knowledge Base](https://support.wisepops.com/) or get in touch with our team.
    
*   I'm just getting started. Do you offer any helpful training, coaching, or extra support?
    
    Absolutely! As a new user of Wisepops, you're never alone in your journey to create engaging onsite marketing campaigns. Here's what we offer to help you get started and succeed:
    
    *   **Wisepops Community Access**: Upon signing up for Wisepops, you'll be welcomed into our private community. It's a space where you can engage with a diverse network of Wisepops users, exchange ideas, and learn from shared experiences.
        
    
    *   **Helpcenter and Tutorials**: We provide a range of tutorials in our Helpcenter that are designed to equip you with practical skills and knowledge for designing effective pop-ups. Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your skills, our tutorials cater to all levels.
        
    
    *   **Weekly Coaching Sessions**: Our weekly coaching sessions are led by seasoned Wisepops professionals. These sessions are an opportunity for you to receive guidance, ask questions, and gain insights specific to your needs.
        
    
    Once you sign up for Wisepops, you'll receive an email within minutes detailing how to access all these resources. We're committed to providing the support and tools you need to create impactful and high-converting marketing campaigns.
    
*   How do I choose the right plan for my business?
    
    We base our pricing on the number of pageviews as well as customer support access.
    
    Example: the 50K and 100K pageviews plans include support via AI support bot, Help Center, and the Wisepops community forum while the 250K and 500K plans add chat support. The 1M pageviews plan also includes a personalized onboarding session. The Enterprise plan adds technical support and strategy calls.
    
    But regardless of the plan you choose, you get all our features along with unlimited campaigns and users.
    
*   How do support access plans differ?
    
    Our support access plans are tailored to cater to a variety of needs, whether you're just starting out or operating at a large scale. Here's a brief overview:
    
    1.  **Basic Plan:**
        
        *   Suitable for **50k to 100k pageviews**.
            
        *   Support is accessible via **email, AI chatbot, Community,** and **Help Docs**.
            
        *   Service requests are addressed within **3 business days**.
            
    2.  **Plus Plan:**
        
        *   Designed for **250k to 500k pageviews**.
            
        *   Adds **live chat support** to the channels available in the Basic plan.
            
        *   Service requests are addressed within **2 business days**.
            
    3.  **Extended Plan:**
        
        *   Tailored for websites with up to **1M pageviews**.
            
        *   Support channels are the same as the Plus plan.
            
        *   Enhanced service response with requests being addressed within **1 business day**.
            
    4.  **Enterprise Plan:**
        
        *   For those operating beyond **1M pageviews**.
            
        *   Introduces **Priority Chat and tech support** in addition to other channels.
            
        *   Rapid response with requests attended to within **12 business hours**.
            
        *   Exclusive benefits like **1:1 onboarding sessions, dedicated success manager, quarterly business review sessions,** and **campaign migrations** are available for those on annual plans.
            
    
*   Do you offer agency plans?
    
    We do! Just [**drop us an email**](https://wisepops.com/contact-us) and we will help you get this set up.
    
*   Do you have any discounts for nonprofits?
    
    Of course! Yes, 30% off. [Contact us](https://wisepops.com/contact-us) to claim the offer.
    

### You’re in good company.
